title: 7.11 bug
body:
Hi,

since the new ban system, i can't launch a game. I have this message before login : "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version."

and when i try to press the button play in the launcher after login (it is disable) and it says : "we aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again."

I've tried to reinstall LoL and all the recommended set up on the Hextech repair tool. i tried to renew my ip and flush my dns but still the same problem.

Best Regards.

replies.body:
This error can happen as a combination of security settings blocking updates and a failed install.  My suggestion here would be to first go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure  League is allowed to update without issue.

Then grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall and get you to most updated files.  I know you did this already, but this time your permissions will be setup properly!  I hope that helps!
